sense.def:
Z izrazom
outgoing
opišemo osebo ali stvar, ki odhaja iz določenega kraja ali z določenega položaja.

seg.quote: ...the outgoing president in his last days of office.

sense.def:
Kdor je
outgoing
, je zelo prijateljski in rad srečuje ljudi.

seg.quote: Adler was an outgoing, sociable kind of man.

sense.def:
One's outgoings
so zneski denarja, ki jih človek potroši.

seg.quote: Try to reduce as many outgoings as possible.
